sentences.sentence: Today we want to show you two furniture collection by French designer Jean Nouvel.
sentences.translation: 今天向大家介绍两组法国设计师让·努维尔设计的家具。

sentences.sentence: Due for completion later this year, this 43 story office tower was designed by jean nouvel.
sentences.translation: 这幢的43层办公大楼出自法国设计师让·努维尔之手，预计在今年下半年完工。

sentences.sentence: Abu Dhabi has its Guggenheim, Qatar new museums by I.M. Pei and Jean Nouvel (see article), not to mention the 2022 football World Cup.
sentences.translation: 阿布扎比有了自己的古根海姆博物馆，卡塔尔由贝律铭和让奴维尔设计的新博物馆已经建成，更不用说它将主办2022年世界杯。
